lead_paragraph: GLICKENHAUS--Seth. The Trustees, Faculty, and Staff of the Mount Sinai Health System mourn the passing of our dear friend Seth Glickenhaus. Seth and his wife, Sarah, have supported a variety of initiatives within the neurosciences as part of a longstanding relationship with Mount Sinai. Their generosity has made a significant impact on The Friedman Brain Institute through the establishment of the Glickenhaus Laboratory of Neuropsychology and the Sarah B. and Seth M. Glickenhaus Professorship; Seth's membership on the Philanthropic Leadership Council also helped to advance our understanding of the brain. His personal support and scientific curiosity will long be remembered and cherished. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Sarah, their children, Nancy and James, their grandchildren, and the entire family. Kenneth L. Davis, M.D., President and CEO Dennis S. Charney, M.D., Anne and Joel Ehrenkranz Dean, Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai and President for Academic Affairs, Mount Sinai Health System 1/3
